message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm looking for a price around $20,000 to make it work. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than I was hoping for. Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. While I understand your position, I'm still unable to go above $12,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
